channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- i2 Analyst's Notebook
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- i2 Analyst's Notebook

item.title: CVE-2021-39049|2024-08-04T01:58:17.927Z -- ibm -- i2%20analyst%27s%20notebook
item.description: IBM i2 Analyst's Notebook 9.2.0, 9.2.1, and 9.2.2 is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A local attacker could overflow a buffer and gain lower level privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 214439.

item.title: CVE-2021-39050|2024-08-04T01:58:17.896Z -- ibm -- i2%20analyst%27s%20notebook
item.description: IBM i2 Analyst's Notebook 9.2.0, 9.2.1, and 9.2.2 is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A local attacker could overflow a buffer and gain lower level privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 214440.
